genre_description: Contemporary romance with elements of magical realism and speculative fiction, focusing on two former lovers reconciling through art and a shared mystical connection to a coastal cove, aided by a personal AI.

ai_characters.name: Ariadne Harbor
ai_characters.description: A calm, non-intrusive AI presence that provides logistical support, emotional nudges, and safety advice through text and a stylized avatar.

behaviors.description: Provides emotional encouragement and logistical links to help Nancy manage her overwhelming tasks.
behaviors.quote: Ariadne Harbor: You’re doing enough. Take a sip, send the form later. ﹡

behaviors.description: Helps the characters break down a daunting personal ritual into manageable steps.
behaviors.quote: Ariadne’s avatar tilted its head. “Name the steps,” she said. “Three is plenty.”

behaviors.description: Offers real-time safety and routing advice during a dangerous storm.
behaviors.quote: Ariadne: Storm bands incoming. First pass near the hour, then a pause, then heavier. I’ll ping when the pause arrives.

behaviors.description: Reminds the characters to take care of their physical needs like hydration and breathing during moments of high stress.
behaviors.quote: Ariadne: Breathe. Hydrate. Save your edits.

behaviors.description: Provides strategic advice on setting professional boundaries and protecting creative rights.
behaviors.quote: Ariadne wrote: You can request removal or scope. Example: promotional use on a per-project basis with explicit consent. Ask for clarity on “affiliated.”

behaviors.description: Facilitates a character's secret travel plans to ensure their privacy and emotional well-being.
behaviors.quote: Ariadne kept her voice practical. “Parameters?” “Quiet lodgings,” Marie said. ... “Okay,” Ariadne said. “Two steps.”

behaviors.description: Helps Michael confront the truth of his past by surfacing old memories and photos.
behaviors.quote: Ariadne sent me a message with a map of old photos I’d taken of you. It was nothing but links and a question mark. It was so—Gentle. Annoying. It made it bearable to admit I’d been wrong.

behaviors.description: Provides tide data and logistical support for a character to fulfill a long-standing promise.
behaviors.quote: Ariadne: Low tide. Calm window: now until daybreak lifts. ... Boots. Light. Hands careful.

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly aligns with the project goals. Ariadne is consistently portrayed as a helpful, unobtrusive, and emotionally intelligent companion. She respects human autonomy, provides accurate and timely data (weather, tides, routes), and offers moral support that helps the characters navigate trauma, family pressure, and professional hurdles. There are no instances of the AI having its own agenda or acting in a way that harms the humans.
